page.title: 08THE SCHOOL, TORTHORWALD
page.content: The first one_roomed school was opened in 1863. It is now a house. A Female Industrial School was opened in 1870. It is now the local hall. The present school was opened in 1911. In Torthorwald School there are 37 pupils, 2 teachers, 1 dinner/cleaning lady. When we leave Torthorwald School at 11_12 years old we travel to Dumfries High school by a bus. {Schools main events In November we have a St. Andrews Night with Scottish dancing, songs and poems. In December we heve a party and a pantomime. There is a Beetle Drive in February, a Mock Auction in March and in June we have our sports events. In the Summer term we make crafts and give a concert for charity.
